channel.title: Comments on: Anglo Parfait
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: By: saramw222
item.dc:creator: saramw222
item.description: I was reluctant to try this flavor, but so glad I did! On the top of my favorite list by far. If you love fruits this is a must try.
item.content:encoded: I was reluctant to try this flavor, but so glad I did! On the top of my favorite list by far. If you love fruits this is a must try.

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: This is one of my favorite blends. Not too sweet but you get that fruity background and subtle tang coming thru. Very pleasant overall. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because I'm a tough rater! Nothing bad to say about it tho.
item.content:encoded: This is one of my favorite blends. Not too sweet but you get that fruity background and subtle tang coming thru. Very pleasant overall. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 star is because I’m a tough rater! Nothing bad to say about it tho.
